action-view.name: action-project-dashlet-expense-waiting
action-view.title: Waiting expenses
action-view.domain: (self.kilometricExpenseLineList.project.id in (:_projectIds) or self.generalExpenseLineList.project.id in (:_projectIds)) AND self.statusSelect < 3

action-view.name: action-project-dashlet-expense-validated
action-view.title: Validated expenses
action-view.domain: (self.kilometricExpenseLineList.project.id in (:_projectIds) or self.generalExpenseLineList.project.id in (:_projectIds)) AND self.statusSelect in (3,4)

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval:"self.expense.statusSelect in (3,4) AND self.project is null"

action-view.name: action-project-dashlet-customer-invoices
action-view.title: Customer invoices
action-view.domain: self.invoiceLineList.project.id in (:_projectIds) AND self.operationTypeSelect = 3 AND self.operationSubTypeSelect != 2

action-view.name: action-project-view-show-sale-invoice-lines
action-view.title: Customer invoice lines
action-view.domain: self.invoice.operationTypeSelect = 3 AND self.project.id in (:_projectIds) AND self.invoice.statusSelect = 3 AND self.invoice.operationSubTypeSelect != 2

action-view.name: action-project-dashlet-supplier-invoices
action-view.title: Supplier invoices
action-view.domain: self.invoiceLineList.project.id in (:_projectIds) AND self.operationTypeSelect = 1 AND self.operationSubTypeSelect != 2

action-view.name: action-project-view-show-purchase-invoice-lines
action-view.title: Supplier invoice lines
action-view.domain: self.invoice.operationTypeSelect = 1 AND self.project.id in (:_projectIds) AND self.invoice.statusSelect = 3 AND self.invoice.operationSubTypeSelect != 2
